column4: guys, firefox 2.0 is crashing when I try to open http://www.cnn.com/2006/AUTOS/carreviews/03/01/cr_reliability/index.html do you have any suggestions?
it could be a plugin that the page is using
yes I installed it like a week ago
I have a friend that has the same problems
when he tries to view a page with any flash, it just closes
does the page have flash on it?
yep, there's flash on the page
so that might be the problem then
very possible.  try removing the flash plugin, using your package manager and then try the site again
